# ‚ö° 5-Minute Setup - Copy & Paste Ready

## Step 1: GitHub Topics (1 click to copy)

**Go to:** https://github.com/Isaloum/StepSyncAI ‚Üí Click ‚öôÔ∏è gear next to "About"

**Copy all topics below (Ctrl+C), paste in Topics field:**

```

```

Type each topic separated by space, GitHub will auto-suggest. Or add them one by one.

---

## Step 2: About Description (1 click to copy)

**In the same popup, paste this in "Description":**

```
üè• Production-grade health tracking platform | 6 integrated apps | 1,927 tests (82% coverage) | CI/CD with GitHub Actions | AWS deployment ready
```

Click **Save changes**

---

## Step 3: Pin Repository (2 clicks)

1. Go to: https://github.com/Isaloum
2. Click "Customize your pins"
3. Click "StepSyncAI" checkbox
4. Click "Save pins"

Done! ‚úÖ

---
